body: Is the BSM (Better sprint mod) permitted on avicus? Cause I know DGB, stimpay, stan and a ton of other PvPers use it.
body_tagged: Is the BSM (Better sprint mod) permitted on avicus? Cause I know DGB, stimpay, stan and a ton of other PvPers use it.
title: BSM mod?

replies.body: Im pretty sure its not allowed
replies.body_tagged: Im pretty sure its not allowed

replies.body:
Are you referring to the toggle sprint button?
In my opponion it should be allowed.
replies.body_tagged:
Are you referring to the toggle sprint button?
In my opponion it should be allowed.

replies.body: Same here.  I don't count it as a hack.  If it isn't allowed, it needs to be ^-^
replies.body_tagged: Same here.  I don't count it as a hack.  If it isn't allowed, it needs to be ^-^

replies.body: This should not be allowed in my opinion (I'm pretty sure it isn't right now anyways). BSM actually has a lot of advantages over holding down you sprint key, which gives you a big advantage.
replies.body_tagged: This should not be allowed in my opinion (I'm pretty sure it isn't right now anyways). BSM actually has a lot of advantages over holding down you sprint key, which gives you a big advantage.

replies.body: No, better sprint is not allowed.
replies.body_tagged: No, better sprint is not allowed.

replies.body: No unfortunately :/ However I think it's a bit of a dumb rule considering holding down the sprint key is better because it reacts quicker.
replies.body_tagged: No unfortunately :/ However I think it's a bit of a dumb rule considering holding down the sprint key is better because it reacts quicker.
